channel.title: Workflow on Newsboat Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Workflow on Newsboat Blog

item.title: Inbox Zero Is a Shape, Not a Goal
item.description:
Inbox zero is the space to think, not the trophy. The point is to keep the lane clear, not to collect cleared lanes.

Sort by intent: delete, delegate, defer, or do. Your future self is a teammate. Leave them an easy handoff.

If you only do one thing today, trim the list so tomorrow feels possible.

item.title: The Two Pass Review
item.description:
The best workflows are boring and reliable. That reliability creates room for creative work.

Defaults are where trust accumulates. Make the safest option the easiest.

Fewer surfaces, fewer surprises. Keep the path short and the intent obvious.
